00074 WSESWrapperMain::~WSESWrapperMain()
00075 {
00076   abortAcquisitionEvent_.set();
00077   if (lib_->isLoaded())
00078   {
00079     if (initialized_)
00080       lib_->GDS_Finalize();
00081     lib_->unload();
00082   }
00083 }

00104 void WSESWrapperMain::release()
00105 {
00106   if (references_ == 1)
00107   {
00108     delete this_;
00109     this_ = 0;
00110     references_ = 0;
00111   }
00112   else if (references_ > 0)
00113     references_--;
00114 }

00152 int WSESWrapperMain::initialize(void *reserved)
00153 {
00154   int errorCode = WError::ERR_OK;
00155 
00156   if (initialized_)
00157     return WError::ERR_OK;
00158 
00159   instrumentLoaded_ = false;
00160   
00161   instrumentLibraryName_ = workingDir_;
00162   if (workingDir_.empty())
00163     instrumentLibraryName_ = "dll\\SESInstrument.dll";
00164   else
00165     instrumentLibraryName_.append("\\dll\\SESInstrument.dll");
00166 
00167   std:string path = workingDir_;
00168   path.append("/ini/Ses.ini");
00169   int bufferLength = 2048;
00170   char* fromFileResult = new char[bufferLength];
00171   memset(fromFileResult, 0, bufferLength);
00172 
00173   DWORD length = GetPrivateProfileString("Global", "Detector Interface", "None", fromFileResult, bufferLength, path.c_str());
00174   path = fromFileResult;
00175   std::replace(path.begin(), path.end(), '\\', ' ');
00176   if (path == "dll Detector Detector_Graph.dll")
00177   {
00178     path = workingDir_;
00179     path.append("/ini/DetectorGraph.ini");
00180     bufferLength = 2048;
00181     length = GetPrivateProfileString("global", "direct_viewer", "None", fromFileResult, bufferLength, path.c_str());
00182     path = fromFileResult;
00183     if (path == "true")
00184       return WError::ERR_QT_RUNNING;
00185   }
00186   delete[] fromFileResult;
00187 
00188         char *tmpDir = _getcwd(0, 0);
00189 
00190   if (!lib_->isLoaded() && !lib_->load(instrumentLibraryName_.c_str()))
00191     errorCode = WError::ERR_LOAD_LIBRARY;
00192 
00193   if (errorCode == WError::ERR_OK && lib_->GDS_Initialize(errorNotify, 0) != 0)
00194     errorCode = WError::ERR_INITIALIZE_FAIL;
00195 
00196   _chdir(tmpDir);
00197   free(tmpDir);
00198   
00199   initialized_ = (errorCode == WError::ERR_OK);
00200 
00201   // Create sesGui database
00202   sesGUI_.clear();
00203   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_InstallInstrument", lib_->GDS_InstallInstrument));
00204   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_InstallSupplies", lib_->GDS_InstallSupplies));
00205   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_InstallElements", lib_->GDS_InstallElements));
00206   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_InstallLensModes", lib_->GDS_InstallLensModes));
00207   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_SetupSignals", lib_->GDS_SetupSignals));
00208   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_CalibrateVoltages", lib_->GDS_CalibrateVoltages));
00209   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_CalibrateDetector", lib_->GDS_CalibrateDetector));
00210   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_ControlSupplies", lib_->GDS_ControlSupplies));
00211   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_SupplyInfo", lib_->GDS_SupplyInfo));
00212   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_DetectorInfo", lib_->GDS_DetectorInfo));
00213 
00214   return errorCode;
00215 }

00228 int WSESWrapperMain::finalize()
00229 {
00230   instrumentLoaded_ = false;
00231   initialized_ = false;
00232 
00233   abortAcquisitionEvent_.set();
00234   
00235   if (lib_->isLoaded())
00236   {
00237     lib_->GDS_Finalize();
00238     lib_->unload();
00239   }
00240   
00241   return WError::ERR_OK;
00242 }

00265 int WSESWrapperMain::getProperty(const char *property, int index, void *value, int &size)
00266 {
00267         PropertyMap::iterator it = properties_.find(property);
00268         if (it == properties_.end())
00269         {
00270                 if (lib_->SC_GetProperty == 0)
00271                         return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00272 
00273                 int error = lib_->SC_GetProperty(property, value, &size);
00274                 if (error == 0)
00275                         return WError::ERR_OK;
00276                 if (error == -1)
00277                         return WError::ERR_PARAMETER_NOT_FOUND;
00278                 else
00279                         return WError::ERR_WRONG_SIZE;
00280         }
00281         return it->second.get(index, value, size);
00282 
00283         int error = lib_->SC_GetProperty(property, value, &size);
00284         return error;
00285 }

00292 int WSESWrapperMain::getProperty(const char *name, int index, void *value)
00293 {
00294   int size = 0;
00295   return getProperty(name, index, value, size);
00296 }

00312 int WSESWrapperMain::setProperty(const char *property, int size, const void *value)
00313 {
00314   PropertyMap::iterator it = properties_.find(property);
00315   if (it == properties_.end())
00316   {
00317     if (lib_->SC_SetPropertyEx != 0)
00318       return lib_->SC_SetPropertyEx(property, value, size) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00319     if (lib_->SC_SetProperty != 0)
00320       return lib_->SC_SetProperty(property, value) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00321     return WError::ERR_PARAMETER_NOT_FOUND;
00322   }
00323   return it->second.set(size, value);
00324 }
00325 
00340 int WSESWrapperMain::validate(const char *elementSet, const char *lensMode, double passEnergy, double kineticEnergy)
00341 {
00342   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00343     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00344 
00345   int i = 0; 
00346 
00347   if (std::find(elementSets_.begin(), elementSets_.end(), elementSet) == elementSets_.end())
00348     return WError::ERR_INCORRECT_ELEMENT_SET;
00349 
00350   if (std::find(lensModes_.begin(), lensModes_.end(), lensMode) == lensModes_.end())
00351     return WError::ERR_INCORRECT_LENS_MODE;
00352 
00353   DoubleVector passEnergies;
00354   loadPassEnergies(lensMode, passEnergies);
00355   if (std::find(passEnergies.begin(), passEnergies.end(), passEnergy) == passEnergies.end())
00356     return WError::ERR_INCORRECT_PASS_ENERGY;
00357 
00358   return WError::ERR_OK;
00359 }

00396 int WSESWrapperMain::loadInstrument(const char* fileName)
00397 {
00398         instrumentLoaded_ = false;
00399         memset(&sesInstrumentInfo_, 0, sizeof(SesNS::WInstrumentInfo));
00400 
00401         if (!initialized_)
00402                 return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00403 
00404         if (*fileName == 0)
00405         {
00406                 std:string path = workingDir_;
00407                 path.append("/ini/Ses.ini");
00408                 int bufferLength = 2048;
00409                 char* fromFileResult = new char[bufferLength];
00410                 memset(fromFileResult, 0, bufferLength);
00411                 DWORD length = GetPrivateProfileString("Global", "Instrument Prefs", "None", fromFileResult, bufferLength, path.c_str());
00412                 path = workingDir_;
00413                 if (path.back() != '\\')
00414                         path.append("\\");
00415                 path.append(fromFileResult);
00416                 delete[] fromFileResult;
00417                 return loadInstrument(path.c_str());
00418         }
00419 
00420         if (*fileName == 0)
00421                 return WError::ERR_FAIL;
00422 
00423         currentInstrumentFile_ = fileName;
00424 
00425         lib_->GDS_GetDetectorInfo(&sesDetectorInfo_);
00426         int errorCode = lib_->GDS_LoadInstrument(fileName);
00427         if (errorCode < 100 || errorCode > 110)
00428         {
00429                 lib_->GDS_GetInstrumentInfo(&sesInstrumentInfo_);
00430                 int length = *sesInstrumentInfo_.Model;
00431                 memcpy(sesInstrumentInfo_.Model, sesInstrumentInfo_.Model + 1, length);
00432                 sesInstrumentInfo_.Model[length] = 0;
00433                 length = *sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo;
00434                 memcpy(sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo, sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo + 1, length);
00435                 sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo[length] = 0;
00436                 instrumentLoaded_ = true;
00437 
00438                 loadElementSets();
00439                 loadLensModes();
00440                 if (lensModes_.size() > 0)
00441                         loadPassEnergies(lensModes_[0], passEnergies_);
00442                 loadElementNames();
00443                 if (elementNames_.size() == 0)
00444                         errorCode = WError::ERR_FAIL;
00445         }
00446         else
00447                 errorCode = WError::ERR_OPEN_INSTRUMENT;
00448 
00449         lib_->GDS_GetGlobalDetector(&sesDetectorRegion_);
00450         sesRegion_.ADCMask = sesDetectorRegion_.ADCMask;
00451         sesRegion_.ADCMode = sesDetectorRegion_.ADCMode;
00452         sesRegion_.DiscLvl = sesDetectorRegion_.DiscLvl;
00453         sesRegion_.FirstXChannel = sesDetectorRegion_.FirstXChannel;
00454         sesRegion_.FirstYChannel = sesDetectorRegion_.FirstYChannel;
00455         sesRegion_.LastXChannel = sesDetectorRegion_.LastXChannel;
00456         sesRegion_.LastYChannel = sesDetectorRegion_.LastYChannel;
00457         sesRegion_.Slices = sesDetectorRegion_.Slices;
00458 
00459         return errorCode;
00460 }
00461 
00471 int WSESWrapperMain::saveInstrument(const char* fileName)
00472 {
00473         try
00474         {
00475                 if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00476                         return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00477 
00478                 if (*fileName == 0)
00479                         return lib_->GDS_SaveInstrument(currentInstrumentFile_.c_str());
00480                 else
00481                         return lib_->GDS_SaveInstrument(fileName);
00482         }
00483         catch (...)
00484         {
00485                 return WError::ERR_FAIL;
00486         }
00487 }

00654 int WSESWrapperMain::checkAnalyzerRegion(WAnalyzerRegion *analyzerRegion, int *steps, double *time_ms, double *minEnergyStep_eV)
00655 {
00656   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00657     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00658 
00659   int error = lib_->GDS_CheckRegion(&sesRegion_, steps, time_ms, minEnergyStep_eV);
00660   analyzerRegion->centerEnergy_ = sesRegion_.FixEnergy;
00661   analyzerRegion->dwellTime_ = sesRegion_.StepTime;
00662   analyzerRegion->energyStep_ = sesRegion_.EnergyStep;
00663   analyzerRegion->fixed_ = sesRegion_.Fixed;
00664   analyzerRegion->highEnergy_ = sesRegion_.HighEnergy;
00665   analyzerRegion->lowEnergy_ = sesRegion_.LowEnergy;
00666   return error == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_INCORRECT_ANALYZER_REGION;
00667 }
00668 
00684 int WSESWrapperMain::initAcquisition(const bool blockPointReady, const bool blockRegionReady)
00685 {
00686   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00687     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00688 
00689   int sesStatus = SesNS::NonOperational;
00690   if (lib_->GDS_GetStatus != 0)
00691     lib_->GDS_GetStatus(&sesStatus);
00692 
00693   if (sesStatus == SesNS::Running)
00694     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
00695 
00696   abortAcquisitionEvent_.reset();
00697   pointReadyEvent_.reset();
00698   regionReadyEvent_.reset();
00699   continueAcquisitionEvent_.reset();
00700 
00701   blockPointReady_ = blockPointReady;
00702   blockRegionReady_ = blockRegionReady;
00703   iteration_ = 0;
00704   sesSpectrum_ = 0;
00705   currentStep_ = 0;
00706   currentPoint_ = std::numeric_limits<int>::min();
00707 
00708   int result = 0;
00709 
00710   if (tempFileName_.empty())
00711     tempFileName_ = "work\\seswrapper";
00712   DeleteFile(tempFileName_.c_str());
00713 
00714   if (lib_->GDS_InitAcquisition != 0)
00715   {
00716     result = lib_->GDS_InitAcquisition(&sesRegion_, &sesSpectrum_, &sesSignals_, tempFileName_.c_str(), WSESWrapperMain::pointReady, WSESWrapperMain::regionReady);
00717   }
00718 
00719   startTime_ = clock();
00720 
00721   return result >= 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00722 }
00723 
00742 int WSESWrapperMain::startAcquisition()
00743 {
00744   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00745     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00746 
00747   int sesStatus = SesNS::NonOperational;
00748   lib_->GDS_GetStatus(&sesStatus);
00749   if (sesStatus == SesNS::Running)
00750     return WError::ERR_ACQUIRING;
00751   startTime_ = clock();
00752   abortAcquisitionEvent_.reset();
00753   pointReadyEvent_.reset();
00754   regionReadyEvent_.reset();
00755   currentStep_ = 0;
00756 
00757   if (lib_->GDS_UseDetector != 0)
00758     lib_->GDS_UseDetector((activeDetectors_ & 0x0001) != 0);
00759   if (lib_->GDS_UseSignals != 0)
00760   {
00761     lib_->GDS_UseSignals((activeDetectors_ & 0x0002) != 0);
00762   }
00763 
00764   int result = 0;
00765   
00766   if (resetDataBetweenIterations_)
00767     iteration_ = 1;
00768   else
00769     iteration_++;
00770 
00771   result = lib_->GDS_Start(&sesRegion_, &sesSpectrum_, tempFileName_.c_str(), iteration_, WSESWrapperMain::pointReady, WSESWrapperMain::regionReady);
00772 
00773   if (lib_->GDS_GetCurrSignals != 0)
00774     lib_->GDS_GetCurrSignals(&sesSignals_);
00775 
00776   return result >= 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00777 }
00778 
00786 int WSESWrapperMain::stopAcquisition()
00787 {
00788   if (!lib_->isLoaded())
00789     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00790 
00791   abortAcquisitionEvent_.set();
00792   pointReadyEvent_.reset();
00793   regionReadyEvent_.reset();
00794 
00795   return lib_->GDS_Stop() == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00796 }
00797 
00812 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcquiredData(const char *variable, int index, void *data, int &size)
00813 {
00814   DataParameterMap::iterator it = dataParameters_.find(variable);
00815   if (it == dataParameters_.end())
00816     return WError::ERR_PARAMETER_NOT_FOUND;
00817 
00818   return it->second.get(index, data, size);
00819 }
00820 
00838 int WSESWrapperMain::waitForPointReady(int timeout_ms)
00839 {
00840   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00841     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00842 
00843   int sesStatus = SesNS::NonOperational;
00844   lib_->GDS_GetStatus(&sesStatus);
00845 
00846   if (sesStatus != SesNS::Running)
00847     return WError::ERR_OK;
00848 
00849   const HANDLE handles[] = {pointReadyEvent_.handle(), abortAcquisitionEvent_.handle()};
00850   DWORD result = WaitForMultipleObjects(2, handles, FALSE, timeout_ms);
00851   return result == WAIT_TIMEOUT ? WError::ERR_TIMEOUT : WError::ERR_OK;
00852 }
00853 
00870 int WSESWrapperMain::waitForRegionReady(int timeout_ms)
00871 {
00872   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00873     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00874 
00875   int sesStatus = SesNS::NonOperational;
00876   lib_->GDS_GetStatus(&sesStatus);
00877 
00878   if (sesStatus != SesNS::Running)
00879     return WError::ERR_OK;
00880 
00881   const HANDLE handles[] = {regionReadyEvent_.handle(), abortAcquisitionEvent_.handle()};
00882   DWORD result = WaitForMultipleObjects(2, handles, FALSE, timeout_ms);
00883   return result == WAIT_TIMEOUT ? WError::ERR_TIMEOUT : WError::ERR_OK;
00884 }
00885 
00894 int WSESWrapperMain::continueAcquisition()
00895 {
00896   pointReadyEvent_.reset();
00897   continueAcquisitionEvent_.set();
00898   return WError::ERR_OK;
00899 }

00901 int WSESWrapperMain::openGui(const char* name)
00902 {
00903         if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00904                 return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00905 
00906         SesGuiMap::iterator p = sesGUI_.find(name);
00907         if (p != sesGUI_.end())
00908         {
00909                 return p->second();
00910         }
00911         return 0;
00912 }

00914 int WSESWrapperMain::loadLensTable(const char* lensmode, const char* filePath)
00915 {
00916         if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00917                 return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00918 
00919         return lib_->SC_LoadLensTable(lensmode, filePath);
00920 }

00922 
00923 int WSESWrapperMain::setupDetector(SESWrapperNS::PDetectorRegion detectorRegion)
00924 {
00925         if (lib_->GDS_SetupDetector != 0)
00926         {
00927                 sesDetectorRegion_.ADCMode = detectorRegion->adcMode_;
00928                 sesDetectorRegion_.FirstXChannel = detectorRegion->firstXChannel_;
00929                 sesDetectorRegion_.LastXChannel = detectorRegion->lastXChannel_;
00930                 sesDetectorRegion_.FirstYChannel = detectorRegion->firstYChannel_;
00931                 sesDetectorRegion_.LastYChannel = detectorRegion->lastYChannel_;
00932                 sesDetectorRegion_.Slices = detectorRegion->slices_;
00933 
00934                 int error = lib_->GDS_SetupDetector(&sesDetectorRegion_) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00935                 if (error == 0)
00936                 {
00937                         detectorRegion->adcMode_ = sesDetectorRegion_.ADCMode;
00938                         detectorRegion->firstXChannel_ = sesDetectorRegion_.FirstXChannel;
00939                         detectorRegion->lastXChannel_ = sesDetectorRegion_.LastXChannel;
00940                         detectorRegion->firstYChannel_ = sesDetectorRegion_.FirstYChannel;
00941                         detectorRegion->lastYChannel_ = sesDetectorRegion_.LastYChannel;
00942                         detectorRegion->slices_ = sesDetectorRegion_.Slices;
00943                 }
00944                 return 0;
00945         }
00946         return WError::ERR_OPEN_INSTRUMENT;
00947 }
00948 
00954 int WSESWrapperMain::checkProperty(const char* name, int size)
00955 {
00956         int property_size = 0;
00957         double tmp_value = 0;
00958         int error = getProperty(name, 0, 0, property_size);
00959         if ((error == WError::ERR_OK) || (error == WError::ERR_WRONG_SIZE))
00960                 if (property_size == size)
00961                         error = WError::ERR_OK;
00962 
00963         return error;
00964 }
00965 
00971 int WSESWrapperMain::parameterType(const char *name)
00972 {
00973   PropertyMap::iterator p = properties_.find(name);
00974   if (p != properties_.end())
00975     return p->second.valueType();
00976 
00977   DataParameterMap::iterator dp = dataParameters_.find(name);
00978   if (dp != dataParameters_.end())
00979     return dp->second.valueType();
00980 
00981   return -1;
00982 }

01155 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqImage(int index, void *data, int &size)
01156 {
01157   if (!readSpectrumObject())
01158     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
01159 
01160   if (data != 0)
01161   {
01162     double *doubleData = reinterpret_cast<double *>(data);
01163     int sliceSize = sesSpectrum_->Channels * sizeof(double);
01164       for (int slice = 0; slice < sesSpectrum_->Slices; slice++, doubleData += sesSpectrum_->Channels)
01165         memcpy(doubleData, sesSpectrum_->Data[slice], sliceSize);
01166   }
01167   size = sesSpectrum_->Channels * sesSpectrum_->Slices;
01168         return WError::ERR_OK;
01169 }

01182 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqSlice(int index, void *data, int &size)
01183 {
01184   if (!readSpectrumObject())
01185     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
01186 
01187   if (index < 0 || index >= sesSpectrum_->Slices)
01188     return WError::ERR_INDEX;
01189 
01190   if (data != 0)
01191     memcpy(data, sesSpectrum_->Data[index], sesSpectrum_->Channels * sizeof(double));
01192 
01193   size = sesSpectrum_->Channels;
01194   return WError::ERR_OK;
01195 }

01240 
01263 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqRawImage(int index, void *data, int &size)
01264 {
01265   unsigned char *uCharData = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char *>(data);
01266   int errorCode = lib_->GDS_GetRawImage != 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
01267   int width = sesDetectorInfo_.XChannels;
01268   int height = sesDetectorInfo_.YChannels;
01269   int byteSize = 1;
01270 
01271   if (size < width * height * byteSize)
01272           errorCode = WError::ERR_INCORRECT_DETECTOR_REGION;
01273   
01274   if (errorCode == WError::ERR_OK)
01275   {
01276     if (data != 0)
01277       errorCode = lib_->GDS_GetRawImage(uCharData, &width, &height, &byteSize) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
01278     size = width * height * byteSize;
01279   }
01280         return errorCode;
01281 }

01482 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqIOData(int index, void *data, int &size)
01483 {
01484   if (!readSignalsObject())
01485     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
01486 
01487   if (data != 0)
01488   {
01489     double *doubleData = reinterpret_cast<double *>(data);
01490     int channelSize = sesSignals_->Steps * sizeof(double);
01491       for (int channel = 0; channel < sesSignals_->Count; channel++, doubleData += channelSize)
01492         memcpy(doubleData, sesSignals_->Data[channel], channelSize);
01493   }
01494   size = sesSignals_->Count * sesSignals_->Steps;
01495   return WError::ERR_OK;
01496 }

01510 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqIOPortName(int index, void *data, int &size)
01511 {
01512   if (!readSignalsObject())
01513     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
01514   
01515   if (data != 0)
01516   {
01517     if (index < 0 || index >= sizeof(SesNS::Char32))
01518       return WError::ERR_INDEX;
01519     memcpy(data, sesSignals_->Names[index], std::min(size, (int)sizeof(SesNS::Char32)));
01520   }
01521   size = strlen(sesSignals_->Names[index]);
01522         return WError::ERR_OK;
01523 }

01558 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqPointIntensity(int index, void *data, int &size)
01559 {
01560   if (!readSpectrumObject())
01561     return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
01562 
01563   if (data != 0)
01564   {
01565     double *doubleValue = reinterpret_cast<double *>(data);
01566 
01567     if (index < 0 || index >= sesSpectrum_->Channels)
01568     {
01569       *doubleValue = 0;
01570       return WError::ERR_OK;
01571     }
01572   
01573     *doubleValue = sesSpectrum_->SumData[index];
01574   }
01575   return WError::ERR_OK;
01576 }
01577 
01591 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqChannelIntensity(int index, void *data, int &size)
01592 {
01593   if (!readSpectrumObject())
01594     return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
01595 
01596   if (data != 0)
01597   {
01598     double *doubleVector = reinterpret_cast<double *>(data);
01599     double *p = doubleVector;
01600 
01601     if (index < 0 || index >= sesSpectrum_->Channels)
01602     {
01603       for (int r = 0; r < sesSpectrum_->Slices; r++)
01604         *p++ = 0;
01605     }
01606     else
01607     {
01608       for (int r = 0; r < sesSpectrum_->Slices; r++)
01609         *p++ = sesSpectrum_->Data[r][index];
01610     }
01611   }
01612 
01613   size = sesSpectrum_->Slices;
01614   return WError::ERR_OK;
01615 }

01625 void __stdcall WSESWrapperMain::errorNotify(int errorCode)
01626 {
01627   this_->errorNotifyHandler(errorCode);
01628 }
01629 
01633 void WSESWrapperMain::errorNotifyHandler(int errorCode)
01634 {
01635   const char *buffer = lib_->GDS_GetLastErrorString();
01636   std::ofstream oFile("seswrapper.log", std::ios::out | std::ios::app);
01637   time_t t = time(0);
01638   std::string tStr = ctime(&t);
01639   int pos = tStr.find('\n');
01640   if (pos != tStr.npos)
01641     tStr = tStr.substr(0, pos);
01642   oFile << "[" << tStr << "] SesInstrument Error " << errorCode << ": " << buffer << std::endl;
01643 }
01644 
01654 void __stdcall WSESWrapperMain::pointReady(int point)
01655 {
01656   this_->pointReadyHandler(point);
01657 }
01658 
01662 void WSESWrapperMain::pointReadyHandler(int point)
01663 {
01664   currentStep_++;
01665   currentPoint_ = point;
01666   pointReadyEvent_.set();
01667 
01668   if (blockPointReady_)
01669   {
01670     HANDLE handles[] = {continueAcquisitionEvent_.handle(), abortAcquisitionEvent_.handle()};
01671     WaitForMultipleObjects(2, handles, FALSE, INFINITE);
01672     continueAcquisitionEvent_.reset();
01673   }
01674 }
01675 
01683 void __stdcall WSESWrapperMain::regionReady()
01684 {
01685   this_->regionReadyHandler();
01686 }
01687 
01691 void WSESWrapperMain::regionReadyHandler()
01692 {
01693   regionReadyEvent_.set();
01694 }
01695 
01701 bool WSESWrapperMain::readSpectrumObject()
01702 {
01703   SesNS::WSpectrum *tmpSpectrum = sesSpectrum_;
01704   if (lib_->GDS_GetCurrSpectrum != 0)
01705     lib_->GDS_GetCurrSpectrum(&tmpSpectrum);
01706   if (tmpSpectrum != 0)
01707     sesSpectrum_ = tmpSpectrum;
01708   return (sesSpectrum_ != 0);
01709 }
01710 
01716 bool WSESWrapperMain::readSignalsObject()
01717 {
01718   SesNS::WSignals *tmpSignals = sesSignals_;
01719   if (lib_->GDS_GetCurrSignals != 0)
01720     lib_->GDS_GetCurrSignals(&tmpSignals);
01721   if (tmpSignals != 0)
01722     sesSignals_ = tmpSignals;
01723   return (sesSignals_ != 0);
01724 }
